title: Interpretation of a dream about someone approaching you for the sake of one person

preview.html: Also, if it looks bad in the dream, this indicates that there are some differences that the dreamer will face in his future. Interpretation of seeing someone approaching you in a dream about a single girl If an unmarried woman sees in a dream that she is sitting in her house, and a person with a very ugly face. He was trying to approach her in a dream and was afraid. Here the meaning appears that there is something bad and important that will happen to this single girl in a dream, and that it will also disturb her in her life. And if a girl sees in a dream that she is looking at a handsome man. And he approached her reassuringly smiling in the dream. The meaning indicates that this single woman will face many good things in her life. Something that makes her very happy, God willing. Also, seeing an unmarried woman in a dream that a familiar person in her life is approaching her, while she felt very happy in the dream. It shows that this single girl will marry a righteous man. And righteousness will happen very soon, God willing, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a gift from a familiar person Interpretation of seeing someone approaching you in a dream about a married woman If a married woman sees in a dream that someone has a bad face, and his appearance is not beautiful, she will approach him and be Very worried about him in the dream. Here the meaning indicates that this married woman dreamer will witness something bad in her married life. And it will bother her a lot, and God is the Most High and All-Knowing. And if a married woman sees in a dream that a very handsome person is approaching. And calm, and she was happy and joyful approaching him in the dream. This indicates the good that this married woman will find in her life. And she will see a lot of good, God willing. As the married woman sees in a dream the person close to her in the dream, and she was very happy in the dream from his presence. The meaning may indicate a crisis that the married woman is suffering from at this time. And she will see many good people who will stand by her in this crisis. Interpretation of seeing a person close to you in a dream for a divorced woman If the divorced woman sees in a dream that someone approached her in the dream, and she knew him well in life and was happy with him. This dream shows her marriage to a person she knows in life. They will live with him for long periods of happiness and prosperity in their lives, God willing. And if the divorced woman dreams in a dream that she was looking at a person who approached her, and his face was very ugly and looked evil in the dream. This dream explains the differences and problems that this woman will see The divorced woman who dreams in her life. And they will suffer from it, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If the divorced woman sees in a dream that her ex-husband was approaching her, and his face was very ugly and his smell was very bad in the dream. The dream indicates the many disagreements that will arise with this divorced woman. And with her ex-husband and their family, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a beard being cut off in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see a trimmed beard in a dream on the Moments website. The beard is considered one of the most important things for men because it gives them a beautiful appearance, and many of them prefer to grow a beard and not cut it because it looks good, and there are those who prefer not to have it, and this is until their age. smallest. What is it, a beard gives old age to some extent, but dream interpretation scientists have confirmed that cutting a beard in a dreamThere are many different interpretations, some of which apply to women and men in all cases. Therefore, through our website, we will explain the details to you. Interpretation of seeing a beard being cut. Many people want to know whether this dream is good or bad to reassure their hearts. Interpretation of a dream of seeing a beard being cut by Ibn Sirin. Whoever sees that his beard is very long, this is a sign of sadness and some sadness. If it appears The beard in a dream seems to be getting longer and reaching the ground, then this is a sign of death. Having a beard that reaches the stomach will be a good thing and will save a lot of money, which will make him very tired. When you see a long beard from the sides only, this is evidence of saving money that he will enjoy Someone other than you. And whoever sees that his chin is cut into two halves, this is evidence that the person is exposed to bankruptcy and the loss of abundant money. Seeing a trimmed beard indicates something good, abundant and good. Anyone over forty years of age who sees a trimmed beard in pajamas, this will be good news about wealth. Interpretation of a dream about cutting a beard for a single woman. When you see an unmarried woman shaving her beard, this indicates the approaching date of engagement. Cutting the beard in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates kindness and entry into modern life. Interpretation of a dream about cutting a beard for a married woman. When a married woman dreams that her partner is shaving his beard. This is a migration for her and a distance from her. Evidence of the effort and exhaustion that will overtake her and her peers. She and her husband will have some enemies and the problems will continue for a while. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a beard being cut off for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman dreams that her partner is shaving his beard, then this birth will be clearer. Proof that birth It will be easy and will not involve any difficulty or fatigue.

title: Interpretations of seeing toothpaste in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Pasting dates in a dream. Pasting dates or date paste, as many Arab countries call it, provides good things that will make him happy in life. In the following article, details of the evil and many interpretations. The elite interpretation scholars said about the dream of curd in a dream... So follow us. Pasting dates in a dream. Seeing dates pasted in a dream means that the dreamer He expects great wealth and many benefits in his life, and happiness will be his portion, God willing. In the event that the dreamer sees the dates of the paste, it is interpreted that he will earn a lot of halal money and will be very happy with it, as he wants to do many important things that serve his life and develop his future with this. Money. This vision also indicates the benefits and profits that he will receive in his life in general. Imam Al-Sadiq believes that seeing dates in a dream is one of the visions that indicate optimism and joy. If the dreamer sees himself kneading dates in a dream, this means that the dreamer will receive Many good things in his life and that he will achieve very good things that will make him feel happy and joyful. When a person goes through fears and problems in this world and sees dates in a dream, it means that he will receive a lot of sustenance and that God will write to him to get out of distress and get rid of big problems. That fell during the past period. Seeing dates that have turned yellow in a dream means that the dreamer will go through a health problem that will make him feel anxious, but the Lord will get him out of it thanks to His strength and power. The secrets of dream interpretation The expert includes an elite group of the leading interpreters of dreams and visions in the country. The website is in Arabic. To access it, type Secrets of Interpretation of Dreams in Google Pasting dates in a dream by Ibn Sirin When the dreamer sees pasted dates in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin, it means that he will be healthy, that God will bless him in his life, and that his children will be righteous. The will of the Lord. If one sees mashed dates in small quantities, this means that livelihood is not ample, and that the dreamer will not obtain many worldly gains, and God knows best. In the event that the dreamer sees that he has a large bowl with many dates in a dream, it symbolizes many... The means of livelihood and the benefits that the dreamer will encounter in his life and that he will enjoy all the blessings of God by grace. In it. Seeing fermented dates in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer will be exposed to some pressures and problems in life, but God Almighty will save him from them and open the doors of livelihood for him and give him much of His bounty. And we will enjoy happiness and peace of mind in our world. In the event that a person experiences a financial disaster and some adversity that disturbs his life and tires him, and he sees dates in a dream, this means that the dreamer will be freed from these problems and that goodness will be his portion and the Creator. It will grant him the overwhelming happiness and peace that he desires. If a person sees in his dream large quantities of dates that taste delicious, this is clear evidence from God that he will fulfill his desired dreams and achieve many useful achievements in life that will make him very happy. Pasting the date in a dream for a woman in love

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about eating sweets according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about eating sweets: Do you see yourself eating sweets as good or bad? What are the negative interpretations of eating sweets in a dream? What does it mean to see dead people offering candy in a dream? In the lines of this article, we will talk about the interpretation of the dream of eating sweets according to Ibn Sirin and the leading interpretation scholars. Interpretation of the dream of eating sweets. Scientists interpreted the dream of eating sweets as evidence of an abundance of kindness and a change in circumstances for the better, and until soon he will meet a beautiful woman and live a wonderful love story with her. He said Interpreters Eating sweets in abundance in a dream indicates the purity that characterizes the dreamer and his behavior towards people with kindness and gentleness, the kitchen of her house, and this means that people love him, respect him, and speak well of him in his life. Absence.Interpretation of a dream about eating sweets by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets the vision of eating sweets as evidence of the dreamer’s improved health conditions and his enjoyment of health and well-being. If the dreamer suffers from loneliness or emotional emptiness and sees himself eating sweets with enthusiasm, this is a sign of his approaching date. from. A marriage contract with a beautiful and cheerful woman with whom he spends his most beautiful moments. Ibn Sirin said: Eating sweets in a merchant’s dream is a sign that God Almighty will bless him with his money and protect him from the machinations of haters. From making some decisions in his life and feeling helpless and psychological pain. The specialized online dream interpretation website features a selection of the best dream and vision interpreters in the Arab world. To access it, type Dream Interpretation Site on the Internet on Google. Interpretation of a dream about eating sweets for a single woman. The commentators said that eating sweets in a dream for an unmarried woman means that she will soon get rid of some of the things that were bothering her in life and she will be reassured and happy, and she eats sweets with enthusiasm, and this means that she will reach everyone. . Their goals will come soon and her efforts will not be in vain. The vision of an unmarried fiancée eating sweets is evidence of the imminence of her marriage to a good man whom she falls in love with at first sight, and he is the source of her happiness in life. Making sweets and then eating them in a dream. . It is a sign that the dreamer will get rid of his negative thoughts, be optimistic, and see life positively, and if the dreamer sees an unknown person offering her a sweet in her dream and then eating it, this means that she will enter a new life. A love relationship filled with happiness and passion soon. Interpretation of a dream about eating sweets for a married woman. Scientists interpreted eating sweets in a married woman’s dream as a sign that she will get a lot of money soon and her financial situation will improve greatly, and if the dreamer sees her partner eating sweets in her dream, this is a sign of that. . He is a good man who helps her in many matters and does not leave her bearing the responsibility alone. Commentators said that seeing sweets for a married woman is evidence that she will get rid of her fears and enjoy relaxation and peace of mind, and if she eats them, this indicates that she loves them very much and is afraid of harming her. title: Interpretation of seeing the number 150 in a dream

preview.html: If the dreamer is not engaged, this means agreeing to a girl’s engagement, and if the dreamer or dreamer carries a lot of responsibility in his life, then seeing the number means that you are making things easier. Interpretation of seeing the number 150 in a dream for a single girlIf an unmarried woman dreams that she is watching the number 150 And she is engaged and attending the wedding. This number indicates that this single woman will get married 150 days after her engagement. Seeing a single girl in a dream is that she writes the number 150 to him in a dream and rejoices. It shows that there are many goals that she will achieve now, God willing. Either the woman will be The single woman who dreams that the number 150 is her house number in the dream, and it was new. Here it indicates the new life that this single woman will have, God willing. And the unmarried woman who dreams that she read the number 150 in the dream and was distinguished by its appearance. It appears that there is something new that this woman will enter The single woman and makes her happy in her life. If a woman sees in a dream that she is sitting on a chair and the number 150 is in the dream. Here it indicates her progress in her work, study, or life. See also: Interpretation of the number 50 in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing the number 150 in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman In the dream, she read the number 150 in the dream and she was happy with it. It indicates that there is something important that this married woman will see in her life during this period of time. It also indicates that the married woman drew the number 150 in the dream and its shape was beautiful. This indicates that she will have Many good things in her life during this time, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a married woman sees her husband asking her to bring more than the number 150 in a dream. Here it indicates great kindness and compassion between this woman and her husband. If a married woman sees that she is looking for the number 150 in The dream and you did not find it. It indicates a problem that this married woman will see in her life. And if a married woman sees that she lives in house number 150, it was beautiful and spacious. It indicates a new life that this dreaming woman will see, which could be good or bad. Interpretation of the vision The number 150 in a divorced woman’s dream: A divorced woman sees in her dream that she is entering into her life 150 specific things. It indicates that this divorced woman will succeed in some of the new things she is entering into, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. A divorced woman sees that she has 150 rooms in the house. It shows many joys Which the divorced woman will see in life. And if the divorced woman sees that her ex-husband gave her a box containing the number 150 in the dream. It indicates the good things that this divorced woman will experience from her ex-husband, and God knows best. The same applies to the divorced woman who dreams that the number 150 is in front of her house to a large extent. Here, it indicates the great happiness that this woman will see in her life. Seeing the number 150 in a divorced woman’s dream is a sign that all the problems and fears she experiences during this period of her life will go away. title: Interpretation of a dream about a bouquet of roses for a single woman named Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a bouquet of roses for single people, according to Ibn Sirin. People encounter many dreams during their lives, and they are symbols or signs that are interpreted according to the dreamer’s condition, and sometimes these dreams come true, so many people want to interpret them. Understand the meaning and wait for what will happen, it may be good or bad, and many girls wondered about the interpretation of a dream about roses for a single woman, according to the translator Ibn Sirin. A bouquet of roses in a dream When an unmarried girl dreams of receiving a bouquet of flowers, this vision indicates that she will find a young man Loyal and devoted he loves and respects her soon, but some associate this with seeing roses at any time of the year except winter. Ok, but if she sees roses in winter, the interpretation is not good because it shows that the unmarried woman is looking for hopeless hopes and ambitions, and a bouquet of white roses indicates that she will marry a young man with a good reputation, high morals, and good character. Behavior and body.Seeing a bouquet of roses in a dream by Ibn Sirin. In fact, roses have beautiful and wonderful meanings. One may see in a dream that someone is giving him many roses, and this indicates a lot of good, blessed, and happy news that will come to whoever sees the dream, whether he is a man. A single girl, a pregnant woman, even a wife, and seeing a bouquet of roses in a dream as interpreted by Ibn Sina: Roses in a dream indicate kindness and nourishment. Roses indicate purity and purity of heart and love for all people. Red roses mean marriage. A yellow rose indicates illness. Exchange Roses indicate understanding and love between the two parties. Seeing a bouquet of roses in a dream for a single woman. Some girls may encounter dreams and roses are the main content of these dreams. The interpretation of roses varies according to their color and the place they were in during the dream, but in general, roses in a single girl’s dream generally indicate Goodness and Blessing: If you receive red roses from a young man, this is a sign that he thinks badly of her and wants to hurt her. Anyone who dreams of sleeping next to roses is a sign of living a love story. Anyone who dreams of picking roses indicates that she is reaping her work and that she will succeed and excel in her work and life. Personality. Roses in the life of a single girl indicate a pure and peaceful life. As for whoever sees her giving roses to others, they symbolize the purity, goodness of her heart, and righteousness. Whoever sees that someone has roses in his hands, this is a sign that she is about to hear happy news. Seeing White roses in her dream suggest that a young man proposes to her and she becomes a good and kind man. Dreaming of a bouquet of roses in a dream about a married woman. Many married women like to interpret the dreams they see during sleep, to predict the coming and avoid it if it happens, or to rejoice in the good that is coming and avoid evil and pray that It goes away before it comes. Dreaming of a bouquet of roses in a dream has different interpretations, such as: When a married woman sees in a dream that she is giving a bouquet of roses as a gift, this is a sign that she is suffering from marital problems. Seeing colored roses for a married woman indicates happiness.
preview.text: Interpretation of a dream about a bouquet of roses for single people, according to Ibn Sirin. People encounter many dreams during their lives, and they are symbols or signs that are interpreted according to the dreamer’s condition, and sometimes these dreams come true, so many people want to interpret them. Understand the meaning and wait for what will happen, it may be good or bad, and many girls wondered about the interpretation of a dream about roses for a single woman, according to the translator Ibn Sirin. A bouquet of roses in a dream When an unmarried girl dreams of receiving a bouquet of flowers, this vision indicates that she will find a young man Loyal and devoted he loves and respects her soon, but some associate this with seeing roses at any time of the year except winter. Ok, but if she sees roses in winter, the interpretation is not good because it shows that the unmarried woman is looking for hopeless hopes and ambitions, and a bouquet of white roses indicates that she will marry a young man with a good reputation, high morals, and good character. Behavior and body.Seeing a bouquet of roses in a dream by Ibn Sirin. In fact, roses have beautiful and wonderful meanings. One may see in a dream that someone is giving him many roses, and this indicates a lot of good, blessed, and happy news that will come to whoever sees the dream, whether he is a man. A single girl, a pregnant woman, even a wife, and seeing a bouquet of roses in a dream as interpreted by Ibn Sina: Roses in a dream indicate kindness and nourishment. Roses indicate purity and purity of heart and love for all people. Red roses mean marriage. A yellow rose indicates illness. Exchange Roses indicate understanding and love between the two parties. Seeing a bouquet of roses in a dream for a single woman. Some girls may encounter dreams and roses are the main content of these dreams. The interpretation of roses varies according to their color and the place they were in during the dream, but in general, roses in a single girl’s dream generally indicate Goodness and Blessing: If you receive red roses from a young man, this is a sign that he thinks badly of her and wants to hurt her. Anyone who dreams of sleeping next to roses is a sign of living a love story. Anyone who dreams of picking roses indicates that she is reaping her work and that she will succeed and excel in her work and life. Personality. Roses in the life of a single girl indicate a pure and peaceful life. As for whoever sees her giving roses to others, they symbolize the purity, goodness of her heart, and righteousness. Seeing colored roses for a married woman indicates happiness.

title: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Kahf in a dream and its meaning according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of reading Surat Al-Kahf in a dream and its meaning According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, Surat Al-Kahf is one of the greatest Qur’anic surahs that illuminates the life of its reader, especially when he recites it. Constantly on Friday in dreams of reciting the Qur’an, so in this article today we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Kahf in a dream and its meaning according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the dream of seeing Surat Al-Kahf in a dream. A person always dreams of reading the Qur’an, especially Surat Al-Kahf, when he is in distress and distress. Whenever he closes The doors of worldly solutions are in his face. Seeing the recitation of Surah Al-Kahf is one of the visions that indicate the approach of deception. The disappearance of worries. If the dreamer falls ill, this is evidence of an imminent recovery, God willing. And in Surah Al-Kahf there are verses about the People of the Cave who were wronged when they believed in God, Lord of the Worlds, and abandoned polytheism. And disbelief, and God helped them, and there was a sign among them which was their lust after death. Therefore, if someone is in an oppressed place and an invalid ruling falls upon him, he cannot recover his rights. Therefore, the interpretation of reading Surah Al-Kahf in a dream means that God will restore his rights to him and all he has to do is be patient. And belief in God that He is just. He who cares about the affairs of His servants more than them, and this vision means that injustice will end soon, God willing. And whoever sees that someone gave him a copy of the Qur’an and opened it to Surah Al-Kahf. This is evidence of the good company that the fortuneteller enjoyed. And that there are many who love him. Indeed, they wish him well and blessings in life, and they are considered good companions. It is one of the best blessings that God bestows upon a person in the interpretation of reading Surat Al-Kahf in a dream. This is evidence for family members that the good news enters the home and its people, rejoicing their hearts. As for what was seen performing in Surat Al-Kahf on Friday and lighting incense, this is evidence that her house is a blessed house and its people are good people. Interpretation of a dream of seeing a man reading Surat Al-Kahf in a dreamInterpretation of reading Surat Al-Kahf in a dream for a righteous and pious person who suffers from anxiety and sadness. It means the end of sadness for the relative, God willing, and for him. To be patient and count the reward for this patience with God. This vision always comes to men who bear full responsibility for the home, its people, and everything related to their financial affairs. And to be responsible for everything related to their safety, security, happiness, and sadness. Therefore, if a person recites Surat Al-Kahf by himself while crying, this It means that he bears many responsibilities. He is no longer able to carry them alone, which makes him suffer and feel less responsible. But this dream means that relief is near, God willing, and all he has to do is be patient and ask God for help. And whoever sees himself reciting Surah Al-Baqarah to his family while they are sitting around him This is evidence that his house is blessed, that all its people are righteous and pious, and that the house is surrounded by God’s care and safety, God willing. As for the interpretation of reading Surat Al-Kahf in a dream, crying with joy and feeling satisfied after waking up. God willing, it will be a promising vision that fulfills all the dreams of the dreamer, and that What comes out of his life is nothing but good. He will not suffer suffering or torment, and all his affairs will be easy, God willing. But if the man is worried because of family disputes

title: Interpretation of seeing the back in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the back in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin confirmed that seeing one's back in a dream has connotations that vary between good and evil. Anyone who sees himself carrying a lot of things feels a great burden, this is an indication that he commits a lot of disobedience and sins. The man who sees a chain in a dream is a sign of his children. The man who dreams that he is tired and leaning back on the wall is a good omen for a good job opportunity abroad through which he collects money for his children. Seeing a broken back in a dream indicates the death of a loved one and dear. As for the dream of seeing a beautiful back, it indicates a stable family life and living in luxury and happiness. As for the one who dreams that he sees the return of a lady, it is an indication of his pursuit and insistence on achieving his goals and ambitions. The meaning of seeing the back in a dream for a man A man who dreams that his back hurts indicates that he is approaching the death of his brother, God knows best. The dream in which the back bends indicates the difficulty of life and the worries that the dreamer carries. As you see, a broken back indicates the tension and fear that the dreamer feels due to living conditions. When a man dreams that he It is burned and is an indication of the sins and taboos that he commits, as it is a warning for him to stop his actions and repent to God Almighty. Perhaps the vision indicates feelings of humiliation and humiliation. The meaning of seeing the back in a dream for a married woman A married woman who dreams of pain in her back is an indication of the difficulties she faces and the feeling of distress. Whoever sees her back injured in a dream, this indicates the existence of differences with her husband that lead to separation or divorce. As for seeing birth control pills on her back, this indicates her bad behavior towards her husband. Whoever sees back massage in a dream indicates the wife's help and support for her husband to reach a high position in his work. Interpretation of seeing the back in a dream for a single woman When a single girl feels pain in her back while she is sleeping, this is a sign of distress and anxiety. Whoever dreams that she exposed her back to a strange man indicates the approach of her engagement and marriage. Who do you see? Rubbing her back with oil indicates that she lives in luxury and happiness with her future husband. Add the dream you want to interpret, indicating the social status in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of dreams to participate in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing an engagement in a dream: Since engagement is one of the joyful events that fill life with joy and happiness, the dream of engagement is human, and in this article we will try to take a look at the meanings of the dream about engagement and what it can mean, whether it is a man or girl, single, married, or pregnant. You may also be interested By learning the number 2 in a dream, with the advice of our followers on our website, the interpretation of preaching in a dream cannot be deduced when you dream of the same vision by any other person, because interpreting a vision in another vision there is a correspondence between them, and this is not considered one of the correct matters that all interpretation scholars have forbidden. Dreams, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about engagement. Seeing a poor man proposing to a girl is still inspired by his death. A girl’s engagement is an indication that a person wants to take on the world and take it from him. Interpretation of a dream about engagement from Nabulsi. Getting engaged to your friends and wearing an engagement ring is evidence of one of your friends getting married in your presence. From someone you know and love. Interpretation of seeing an engagement with a man. Seeing a poor man proposing to an inspired girl is still close to his death. When he dreams that he is engaged to a virgin girl, this is evidence that the man will achieve what he wants. Interpretation of seeing engagement in a dream. Interpretation of engagement in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that The interpretation of seeing an engagement in a dream indicates that the girl will marry a good man, and God knows best. As Ibn Sirin says, engagement in a dream generally symbolizes agreement. As for an unmarried girl who dreams of an engagement, this may indicate the presence of disagreements between her and her fiancé. Also, the dream The Friday sermon is one of the good deeds that indicate the blessings and good things that the dreamer is blessed with, and God knows best. In addition to the fact that a man dreams of participating, this may be an indication that he will be able to achieve all the goals he seeks. See also: Project in a dream Seeing participation in a dream For a single woman: An unmarried girl who sees an engagement in a dream, this indicates that this girl’s mind is always busy with love. Also, when an unmarried girl dreams of an engagement, this may be an indication that she is thinking about a specific person and wants to communicate with him. In addition to the unmarried girl A married woman who sees an engagement in a dream, this may be an indication that she will be able to achieve everything she wants - God willing. As for a female student who dreams of an engagement, this portends her success in school, getting a job, or getting married soon - God willing. See also: Symbols Which indicates problems. Seeing an engagement in a married woman’s dream. A married woman who sees in a dream an engagement party or that she is engaged to someone other than her husband, this may indicate mutual kindness and love with the husband. Also, if a married woman sees an engagement in a dream, this indicates mutual love between the husband and individuals. Family - God willing. Also, dreaming of a married woman’s engagement is one of the signs that indicate the family stability that this woman enjoys. See also: Insulting religion in a dream. Seeing an engagement in a dream.

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing being beaten in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see beating in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, and Al-Nabulsi Beating is one of the tools by which a person expresses his intense encouragement and anger. One of the problems can reach a permanent disability, and beating in a dream shows many benefits, kindness, and money, and hitting with a sword shows material losses and losses in trade. He dreams of seeing him beating Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen says: If he sees that the ruler is hitting him with his hand with wood or with iron, this indicates He will bring new clothes and take a lot of money. If you see your father hitting you on the hand, this means that you will get a lot of money from him. And if he sees that someone is hitting him with a sword, this indicates a great loss of money. If a person sees in his dream that he is being slapped forcefully Imam Al-Nabulsi says, if you see in your dream that someone hit you with a sword or a sharp knife, then this vision indicates many good changes in the dreamer’s vision, but if you see that The dead person has hit you, it means that you are committing many sins. If you see in your dreams that someone hits you in the stomach, this vision indicates that you will get a lot of money, but after great suffering, but if you see a crack in your stomach because of the beating, it means guidance . Away from the path of sins and misdeeds. And if you see in your dream that you are being hit in the face or slapped and screaming, then this is a pessimistic vision that means a great disaster for whoever sees it and indicates the death of someone close. If you see that someone is hitting you on the head, then this vision indicates the achievement of aspirations and goals. Which you are planning. She dreams of seeing a single woman being beaten. Ibn Sirin says: If an unmarried woman sees in her dream hitting her with his hand on the arm, this means that she will marry a relative of that person, if she knows that person. If she sees that she was hit in the face and did not feel the blow, this indicates That she will suffer a serious failure in her emotional relationship. If she dreams of seeing bumps on her chest, this means that someone loves her deeply. Ibn Sirin says, if she dreams that her father or brother has beaten her, this indicates the abundance of goodness that she will receive. If an unmarried woman sees someone He slaps her hand in her dream, this indicates that she will get married soon, and if she already knows this person she will marry him. If unmarried women see that they are being violently beaten by a stranger, this means that they will get married suddenly and in a short time. If she sees herself in a happy dream That she was beaten is evidence that she did not marry until many years later. This vision indicates a delay in marriage. She dreams of seeing a pregnant woman being beaten. If a pregnant woman dreams that there is a group of young men being severely beaten, this vision shows that God will give her a son who has the qualities of courage and strength. Seeing a pregnant woman during her sleep being beaten by someone with a stick. He continued to beat her. Until traces of beating and wounds appeared all over her body, and this indicates that this woman is committing a great sin and disobedience, and that this woman
